Package com.jenmann.util

Class APIFormatUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jenmann.util.APIFormatUtility
  • public class APIFormatUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class helps standardize the formatting of API responses into stringified versions of certain response types.
    Author:
    jcmann

      int determineStatusCode​(java.lang.String responseJSON)
      This helper method updates the status code in the event the object mapping process failed.
      java.lang.String jsonFormatter​(java.lang.Object objectToMap)
      This method is used to turn any passed in object into stringified JSON using the object mapper.

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIFormatUtility

        public APIFormatUtility()

    • Method Detail

      • jsonFormatter

        public java.lang.String jsonFormatter​(java.lang.Object objectToMap)
        This method is used to turn any passed in object into stringified JSON using the object mapper. Because it expects an Object typed parameter, it handles both collections and individual entities.
        Parameters:
        objectToMap - any object that needs to be run through the objectmapper
        Returns:
        a String of the json response after being mapped, or an error message if the objectMapper fails

      • determineStatusCode

        public int determineStatusCode​(java.lang.String responseJSON)
        This helper method updates the status code in the event the object mapping process failed.
        Parameters:
        responseJSON - the objectMapper's produced String, which will either be a valid object or a fail text
        Returns:
        the status code as an integer
